page.title: 09DEACONESS OF HOLT
page.content: {THE DEACONESS AT WORK Deaconess Ann Barber has worked in St. James' church, Holt for two years. Before she became Deaconess she worked as a parish worker in Wimborne and assisted in services at Wimborne Minster. {SUNDAY SERVICES The Deaconess takes three services every Sunday, but few people attend them. Holt Parish Church (St.James's) has no sunday school and only four choir boys. More people attend the services on special days such as Christmas and Easter. {CHURCH VISITORS Most people who visit the church live in or near Holt, but a few people come from other parts of the country, or even abroad. Many people who visit the church come from the craft centre nearby.
